title: Cell Phone Plans
description: Avoid the high costs and 'hidden' contracts of Canadian mobile service.

content.title: BYOD vs. Financing
content.text: Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) plans are usually cheaper. If you finance a new phone, you are essentially signing a two-year credit contract. If you cancel early, you must pay the full remaining cost of the phone immediately.

quiz.question: Which type of plan is usually easier for a newcomer to get without a credit check?
quiz.explanation: Pre-paid plans require no credit check because you pay for the service before you use it.
